Flub.Name: Rainfall
Flub.Description: The number of rain cycles to calculate. Smaller values create small, detailed flows. Larger values create stronger, wider flows.

Flub.Name: Primary
Flub.Description: Adds primary flow to the output.

Flub.Name: Secondary
Flub.Description: Adds secondary flow to the output.

Flub.Name: Tertiary
Flub.Description: Adds tertiary flow to the output.

Flub.Name: Quaternary
Flub.Description: Adds quaternary flow to the output.

Flub.Name: Uniform
Flub.Description: Applies uniform enhancement to all the flows.

Flub.Name: All
Flub.Description: The enhancement value for all the flows.

Flub.Name: Primary
Flub.Description: The enhancement value for the primary flow.

Flub.Name: Secondary
Flub.Description: The enhancement value for the secondary flow.

Flub.Name: Tertiary
Flub.Description: The enhancement value for the tertiary flow.

Flub.Name: Quaternary
Flub.Description: The enhancment value for the quaternary flow.
